original_text: But if she does leave him, she must not marry another man. Or she should go back to live with her husband. In the same way, a husband must not send his wife away.
korean_text: (만일 갈라섰으면 그대로 지내든지 다시 그 남편과 화합하든지 하라) 남편도 아내를 버리지 말라

sentences.original_text: But if she does leave him
she must not marry another man
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 다른 남자와 결혼해서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: a husband must not send his wife away
sentences.korean_translation: 남편은 그의 아내를 내보내서는 안 된다
